smp_basic.description: IET NITK's Official Mentorship Program, exclusive for first and second years.
smp_basic.faq:
**Q: What are the benefits of completing the SMP?**

A: Official certificates will be given for each SMP that you complete. Also, you would not have to sit for 1st round of Club recruitment and would be directly shortlisted. Plus you’ll gain hands on knowledge on the SMP you take :).

**Q : When will the program begin?**

A : Tentatively from 7th of May

**Q : Can people from other colleges attend the SMP?**

A : Of course yes. Power is gained by sharing knowledge and not by hoarding it.

**Q : Which years can take SMP?**

A : Mainly it is meant for 1st and 2nd years but 3rd and 4th years are welcomed as well :)

**Q : What are the prerequisites for the SMP?**

A : No prerequisites as such. Our mentors would be starting from level zero.

**Q : Is there a limit to the number of SMPs one can take?**

A : No limit! But we would recommend not taking up more than 3 to avoid overburdening, which would suck out the fun !!

**Q : How to register for the SMP?**

A : Fill up the registration form that is available on our official iet nitk website.

**Q: What is the deadline for registration?**

A : 6th May

**Q: Where do I go for more information regarding an SMP?**

A: Refer to the document that is shared in the Registration form and is available on our website as well.

**Q : Where will the sessions take place?**

A : They can happen over Meets or Teams depending upon the platform.

All the resources will be shared with the participants regularly on a common group preferably whatsapp or over their mails.

For further details, contact : 
- Marmik   (+91 8378994789)
- Sriram        (+91 9740649410)

**Website**           : [https://iet.nitk.ac.in/](https://iet.nitk.ac.in/)      

**Instagram**        : [https://www.instagram.com/ietnitk/?hl=en](https://www.instagram.com/ietnitk/?hl=en)

**LinkedIn**          : [https://www.linkedin.com/company/ietnitk](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ietnitk)

**Telegram**         : [https://t.me/IET_NITK](https://t.me/IET_NITK)

nodes.description: This will be your gateway to learning Web Development with Javascript: only prerequisite preferred is knowledge of basic HTML.
nodes.title: Gateway to JSVerse: Web Development with Javascript

nodes.description: Introduction to Competitive Programming from scratch. Assignments and resources will be provided after each session to have a grip on the SMP.
nodes.title: Get set for Competitive Programming

nodes.description: We’ll be learning the basics of Web Development with Ruby on Rails as a back-end.
nodes.title: Web Development with Ruby on Rails

nodes.description: Database management system is a software which is used to manage the database, a collection of information that is organized so that it can be easily accessed, managed and updated. In this course, we will be covering the basics of DBMS and MySQL.
nodes.title: INSERT INTO smps VALUES (“Gateway to SQL”)

nodes.description: Deep Learning (DL) is  a technique for Machine learning (ML). Machine Learning is  an approach to achieve Artificial Intelligence and Artificial intelligence is a medium  to get Humans work done by Machine. Hence, DL is a subset of ML and ML is a subset of AI. Keras is a DL API written in python, running on top of the machine learning platform Tensorflow.
nodes.title: Deep Learning with Keras Framework

nodes.description: Computer Vision is defined as a field of study that seeks to develop techniques to help computers “see” and understand the content of digital images such as photographs and videos. This course will cover the basics of Image processing, Neural networks and other important topics which come under CV. Python will be used as the programming language throughout this course. Image processing will be done using OpenCV library whereas Keras framework will be used for deep learning.
nodes.title: Computer Vision for Beginners

nodes.description: We aim to develop fluent communication skills. Also, we shall focus on removing the hesitation gap while talking to random people to express your opinion on any given topic. We shall also focus on organising and presenting your thoughts to either convince or teach other people.
nodes.title: Inkheart presents Toastmasters

nodes.description: A course to take you through the amazing ride of how a movie/screenplay is written from scratch along with a brief introduction to cinematography.
nodes.title: Lights, Camera, Script!

nodes.description:
French is spoken by more than 220 million people on five continents. It’s the international language of cooking, film, fashion, theatre, the visual arts and dance. But it’s also a language that inspires fear in learners because of its notoriously tricky pronunciation. In this course, we shall demonstrate to you that learning this beautiful language doesn’t have to take a lifetime.
With the knowledge of French, you can add an extra and most required skill to your profile.
nodes.title: French for Beginners

nodes.description: Learn the basics of Photoshop, photo editing, graphic designing and create posters of your kind.
nodes.title: Photoshop, Editing and Graphic Design

nodes.description:
MATLAB is a high level programming platform used  by millions of engineers to analyze data, develop algorithms, and create models.
In this course we try and create an automated car parking system using MATLAB and Simulink.
nodes.title: Automated car parking system using MATLAB

nodes.description: This SMP will cover topics in Digital Electronics including Number system, Logic gates, Combinational circuits, Sequential circuits and Finite state machines (FSM) and Memories. Along side, implementation of what you’ll be lerning in digital electronics, using Verilog,to make you feel comfortable with Verilog programming,
nodes.title: Digital Design with Verilog

nodes.description: This SMP will cover topics including basics of c++ and Linked list from Data structure. At the end you will make a real-life project using a doubly linked list.
nodes.title: Phonebook using Doubly Linked List

nodes.description: Arduino is an open-source electronics platform based on easy-to-use hardware and software.Over the years Arduino has been the brain of thousands of projects, from everyday objects to complex scientific instruments. In this course we create a Mini Jarvis using Arduino coding.
nodes.title: Mini Jarvis using Arduino

nodes.description: CATIA is a solid modeling tool that unites the 3D parametric features with 2D tools and also addresses every design-to-manufacturing process. All the basic level Modeling operations will be discussed.  Also, we will be mentoring you to complete a project which requires the knowledge of topics covered.
nodes.title: 3D Modeling Using CATIA

nodes.description: MATLAB is a high-performance language for technical computing. It integrates computation, visualization, and programming in an easy-to-use  environment where problems and solutions are expressed in familiar  mathematical notation. We'll learn the basic concepts of MATLAB and apply the learnt concepts in a real-life project.
nodes.title: MATLAB- Programming for Engineering Applications

nodes.description: Learn the basics of set up, solve and visualize the results of a modal simulation in Ansys.
nodes.title: Engineering simulations using Ansys
